title: 100 thieves
body: Is any other NA fan completely embarrassed watching Rikkara and Ryu play League? They clearly don't belong here. I would rather have seen Echo Fox.

replies.body: Ryu has never been the same since that zed 1v1 against faker, poor guy... was scarred for life.

> [{quoted}](name=simply bad,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=Yl1GBlVt,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-10-17T08:44:37.580+0000)
>
> Ryu has never been the same since that zed 1v1 against faker, poor guy... was scarred for life.

This might sound funny, but maybe it's not. (Im not saying YOU are mocking him) But the moment did seem absolutely devastating to him.
I kinda feel bad for him.

How did 100 thieves make it to worlds?
_I did not watch any games this split, so i am genuinely curious. Did they just get lucky in NA?_

> [{quoted}](name=FableBlaze,realm=EUW,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=Yl1GBlVt,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-10-17T12:29:56.172+0000)
>
> How did 100 thieves make it to worlds?
> _I did not watch any games this split, so i am genuinely curious. Did they just get lucky in NA?_

Championship points. Besically they got a free pass because they made finals in spring and got enough points in summer to get instalocked into 2nd seed. A stupid system IMO because they were not impressive during summer and showed during World that they were not good enough to be there. They sould have gone to Play-ins at the very least to prove their worth.
That grex/100t match felt like it was a comedic opening act performed by bronze players they put together to warm up the crowd for the fnatic/invictus match.
Theyre what? 2-4? Thats not nearly that bad. Geng was 1/5, mad 0/6.
G-Rex (3rd Seed LMS)  was also 0/6. The only team 100T was able to get wins off of lol
went downhill since the meteos trade

Cody Sun and Meteos aren't there anymore... They got them that far lol.

100T was riding off past success

Not really embarrassed. They did the best that they were able to do with the talent they had, so I’m glad for that. Had they of lost to G-Rex that would have been really disappointing. The real embarrassments were actually TSM and Echo Fox. Had they of performed better over the past year we would have probably sent a team with the potential to do something in that group. 

It’s one thing to lose against teams like fnatic or IG, it’s another to lose to Clutch Gaming in a best of five or, perhaps even more embarrassing, for a team with Huni and Dardoch on it to not even be able to make top four in the summer split. 

I would throw spring split Cloud 9 in there as well but they only lost to TL in the playoffs so I won’t really hold that against them too much.
